Actions.Name: Razor Wind
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times:
Actions.Effects: Dash 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Must move in the same direction.

Interrupts.Name: Twirl
Interrupts.Trigger: The Twinsoul takes damage from an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: The Twinsoul teleports 3 after the ability resolves, then gains evasion until the start of its next turn.
